metadata.name: A Dark and Stormy Night
metadata.description:
This collection of 1/1 archive photographs of New York is a visual celebration of my 20+ years lived in this city: Its multitudes, its extraordinary scenes, and its staggering architecture, as well as a quiet elegy to its decay and rebirth.

This collection strives to be a token of sincere gratitude from the eyes of a Turkish immigrant, whose youth revolved around a deep fascination with American pop culture in the 1980s and 1990s, and a longing to belong to this city of neon and chrome.

Artist: Engin Beri
Collection: City of Neon and Chrome
Location: New York, NY / USA
Date: 2014
Dimensions: 3000px x 3750px
Edition: 1/1â€¨
